alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:01PM EDT until April 08 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam and at Shawneetown .Minor flooding continues along the Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam at Shawneetown. Water levels are falling, and the river will fall below flood stage this weekend at both locations. For the Ohio River...including J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 37.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 37.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 19.7 feet Monday, April 17. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
